EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at EMC World
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
EVENT NAME Tagline Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thanks for visiting Pivotal at EMC World <http://pivotal.io/emc-world> in Las Vegas. We hope you enjoyed learning how enterprises are using Digital Transformation to drive modern, software experiences for their customers.
In case you missed anything, here’s a quick recap:
- Keynote Recording – Pivotal CEO, Paul Maritz joined Joe Tucci and Pat Gelsinger to present a session <http://www.emcworld.com/emctv.htm?id=4232088673001> about Enterprise Hybrid Cloud, PaaS, Big Data and Digital Transformation.
- Key Interviews – Bill Cook <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VdwiBBzVPOA> spoke with EMCTV about how Pivotal is helping customers on their transformational journeys. Additionally, Michael Cucchi <https://youtu.be/MpH_F5ze-Dc?list=PLenh213llmcbskhko-e7sAeEKZYETuJGE> and Craig Steel <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eWgH_I02Y4c> were interviewed on theCUBE.
- Announcements – There was big news for Pivotal Big Data Suite <https://pivotal.io/big-data/press-release/pivotal-big-data-suite-accelerates-digital-transformation>, with major performance and feature improvements, as well as Open Data Platform integration.
- Posts – Read blogs about the latest updates to Pivotal HAWQ <http://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/p-o-v/pivotal-hawq-lands-in-the-hortonworks-sandbox> and upgrades to Pivotal Greenplum Database <http://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/products/greenplum-database-adds-the-pivotal-query-optimizer>.
Want more?
- Turbocharge data science <https://www.brighttalk.com/webcast/9573/155785?utm_partnersource=Pivotal> with Pivotal HAWQ and the Hortonworks Data Platform.
- Come see Pivotal in action at a Pivotal Big Data Roadshow <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow> or Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow <http://pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow> near you. - Visit Pivotal Training <http://pivotal.io/training/emc-world> to learn about our education and certification programs.
By unifying big data, cloud <https://pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/pivotal-cloud-foundry> and agile product development, Pivotal is providing the platform for Digital Transformation and shaping the future for modern enterprises.
We look forward to seeing you at the next Pivotal event <https://pivotal.io/news-events>!
The Pivotal Team
